product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
The banner is an elegant product promotion layout, primarily structured in a soft quadrantal grid with pastel pink tones. The background features four quadrants in varying shades of blush, accented with faint circular graphics and diagonal lines for subtle depth. The upper-left section includes the brand name (id: "brand_name") in bold, followed by a two-line product title (id: "heading") and a metallic product specification tagline (id: "tagline"). The central top-right showcases the product image (id: "product_image"). The bottom-left quadrant features a bulleted description (id: "description"), a bold price tag (id: "price"), and a prominent rectangular call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") with a "SHOP NOW" label (id: "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Dusty Rose: #C85B5F  
- Blush Pink: #FFE4E1  
- Soft Coral: #FBD3D3  
- Light Peach: #FFF5F5  
- Muted Berry: #733538  
- Warm White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a pair of elegant earrings characterized by a soft, feminine color palette. The dominant color is a soft rose gold (#F4A7B9), used for the metal structure, providing warmth and sophistication. The blush pink insert (#F7C6D1) enhances a delicate, classy appeal. Sparkling white crystals (#FFFFFF) add brilliance, contrasting beautifully against the pink tones. Hints of cool silver-gray (#D1D1D1) from the marquise-cut stones balance the warmth, ensuring visual harmony. The colors blend seamlessly through smooth metallic transitions but are individually highlighted using high reflectivity in the crystals, creating a luxurious and artistic feel. Perfect for an elegant advertisement banner.
